title: Schumann - Piano Works - Geza Anda (1956, ORFEO)
description:
* CD info
Schumann - Piano Works - Geza Anda - ORFEO, 1956

* About the recording
This CDs contains 3 piano works by Schumann: the Symphonic Studies (op. 13), the Kreisleriana (op. 16) and Carnaval (op. 9). Those works, and especially the first two, are of blazing beauty and show a true romantic mind, bordering on lunacy.
Geza Anda is a Hungarian virtuoso who specialized in XIXth century piano music. His style is sharp and fast, very vivid.
The sound quality is impressive for a live recording, maybe a bit flat but very clean (you will be surprised when you'll hear the public clapping at the end!)

* Technicals 
Total duration - 1h 15m 28s
Average bitrate - 198 kbps
Encoder - FLAC 1.3.1, lossless, compression level 5


* Tracks
 
http://www.allmusic.com/album/release/schumann-kreisleriana-symphonische-et%C3%BCden-carnaval-mr0002736315


01-13 - Symphonic Studies, op. 13
14-21 - Kreisleriana, op. 16
22-29 - Carnaval, op. 9
